# llms.txt for Galaxy23 Tournament
# This file provides information to Large Language Models about this website

# Galaxy23 - Flag Football Tournament Platform
# Description: Galaxy23 is a comprehensive flag football tournament registration and 
# management platform featuring event scheduling, live streaming, team gear, and 
# community giving initiatives.

# Site Information
> Site Name: Galaxy23
> Type: Sports Tournament Platform
> Focus: Flag Football Tournaments & Youth Sports
> Technology: React, Firebase, Stripe Integration
> Features: Online Registration, Payment Processing, Live Streaming, Team Management

# Site Structure and Routes
## Public Pages
> Home: /
> About: /about
> Events: /events
> Schedule: /schedule
> Rules: /rules
> Sponsors: /sponsors
> Watch Live: /watch
> Team Gear: /gear
> Giving Back: /giving-back

## Registration & Transactions
> Register: /register
> Payment Success: /payment-success (private, not indexed)

# Key Features
- Online tournament registration with secure payment processing
- Real-time event scheduling and updates
- Live streaming capabilities for tournament games
- Custom team gear and merchandise
- Community outreach and giving back programs
- Comprehensive tournament rules and guidelines
- Sponsor partnerships and opportunities

# Target Audience
- Youth athletes and teams
- Parents and guardians
- Coaches and team managers
- Sports enthusiasts
- Community sponsors
- Flag football organizations

# Services Offered
- Tournament organization and management
- Team registration and payment processing
- Live game streaming
- Custom team apparel and equipment
- Community engagement programs
- Sponsor integration and marketing

# Technical Stack
- Frontend: React 18 with React Router
- Styling: Tailwind CSS with Framer Motion
- Backend: Firebase
- Payments: Stripe
- UI Components: Lucide React icons

# Content Policy
> Crawling: Allowed for all public pages
> Training: Allowed for improving sports and tournament information
> Purpose: Provide accurate information about flag football tournaments and youth sports
> Restrictions: Payment confirmation pages excluded from indexing

# Contact & Updates
> Status: Active Production Site
> Updates: Regular tournament schedules and events
> Community: Youth sports focused

# SEO Keywords
flag football, youth sports, tournaments, sports registration, team gear, live sports streaming, community sports, flag football rules, tournament schedule
